ComicInfo.Summary: On his way to Mega City 2, Dredd and his retinue stop at a monument in Death Valley that commemorates a battle between Judges and robots. As Dredd reminisces about the battle, the still-extant robot forces attack.
ComicInfo.Tags: Ant Wars,Captain Villa,Dan Dare,Hitman,Judge Dredd,Judges of Mega-City One,Sam Slade,Spikes Harvey Rotten,Tharg the Mighty,The Cursed Earth,The Great Bear,Tweak
